sense.def:
To feel pity for someone
pomeni, da nam je zelo žal za nekoga.

To pity someone
pomeni, da nam je zelo žal za nekoga.

seg.quote: She pitied him with her whole heart.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
it is a pity
povemo, da smo razočarani ali da nam je žal, ker se je nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: It will be a terrible pity if this should happen.

sense.def:
To take pity on someone
pomeni, da se nam nekdo smili, zato mu pomagamo.

seg.quote: A man who spoke English took pity on us and it was all sorted out.
